name: Psystrike
effect:
This Move is resisted with the Foe's Defense instead of its Sp. Defense. 
 At Silver Rank, increase this move's power to 5.
 At Gold Rank, add 3 chance dice to reduce the foe's defense and 3 chance dice to inflict confusion.
 At Platinum Rank, increase this move's power to 7.
 At Diamond Rank, this move changes it's accuracy to Special and Inflicts Wounds.
description: Through sheer psychic power, the user materializes its energy to deal a heavy strike to its foe.
